column5: Sept 17 flew to Whitehorse and rented a mini RV to tour around for the week, it was a touring trip with my girlfriend and I fished when I had the chance, plenty of great looking rivers, ice cold from the mountains, the salmon runs were over, but managed to catch some grayling (a first for me) and pike (caught plenty of those in before), it's an awesome place, we loved the Yukon, who knows, we may end up there
Chris c'mon man, let's see some pictures!  Sounds like a great trip.
Solo, you do mean fish right?
Yeah...just a few pics please! Truly one of my top 3 places in this great country. You lucky devil.
I'm curious, what are your other 2 top places in Canada Roy? (if you loved the Yukon, I think I will like your other spots)
